name: exercises-
description: 1   Count duplicate characters in the string. Output can be a HashMap<String, Integer> or whatever container you like)  2   Find the 1st non-repeated character in the string  3   Reverse letters in the string 4   Check if the string contains only digits 5   Count the number of vowels and consonants in the string 6   Count the occurrences of the character in a string. The method has 2 params character and word 7   Generate all permutations for the string 8   Check if the word is a palindrome 9   Remove duplicate characters from the string 10  Remove a given character from the string 11  Find the characters with the most appearances 12  Find the longest common prefix for an array of strings

scripts.exercisesAll: npm run 01 && npm run 02 && npm run 03 && npm run 04 && npm run 05 && npm run 06 && npm run 07 && npm run 08 && npm run 09 && npm run 10 && npm run 11 && npm run 12
